short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension which displays markdown live preview on Tildes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows live preview of markdown for the Tildes. It works for comments and also while submitting a new post. This extension is completely open source and released under MIT license.

link to Github - https://github.com/avinassh/tildes-plus
